database.name: VIEW SESCR_PRODUCT_DATA_V
database.view: SELECT a.m_product_id AS sescr_product_data_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.value, a.name, a.c_uom_id, a.m_product_category_id, a.ispurchased, a.issold, a.producttype, a.em_sswh_withholding_source_id AS sswh_withholding_source_id, a.isstocked, a.production, a.c_taxcategory_id, a.isbom, e.p_revenue_acct, e.p_asset_acct, e.p_expense_acct, e.p_cogs_acct FROM m_product a JOIN m_product_acct e ON a.m_product_id = e.m_product_id
